channel.title: Bioconductor on Phil Chapman's Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Bioconductor on Phil Chapman's Blog

item.title: Bioinformatics in the Tidyverse
item.description: Introduction This is a blog post to expand on a talk I gave at the Manchester R Users Group on 21st February 2017. In it I give a brief overview of the tidyverse and its core concepts, before going on to discuss how the same concepts can be applied to bioinformatics analysis using Bioconductor classes and packages. What is the tidyverse? The tidyverse is a suite of tools primarily developed by Hadley Wickham and collaborators at RStudio.
